instructions: Open the App Store on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. Make sure that you're signed in with the Apple ID that you purchased or downloaded the app with. Search for the app, then tap it. Or to find the app in your purchases, tap Today, then tap the My Account button or your photo at the top of the screen. Tap Purchased, then find the app. You might need to tap "Not on this [device]" to see all of your apps. Swipe up to find the Ratings & Reviews section, then tap App Support. If you don't see App Support, make sure that you're signed in with the correct Apple ID. iPhone showing the Ratings & Reviews section of an app's page in the App Store.
